metadata.title: It's Not Dog Hair It's German Shepherd Glitter Linen Throw Pillow Case, Dog Lover Gifts, German Shepherd Mom Gifts, Funny German Shepherd Pillow Case, 18 x 18 Inch Cushion Cover for Sofa Couch Bed
features: MATERIAL&SIZE：Durable and environmentally friendly cotton linen materials.18" x18" throw pillow cover with uniquepatternin black as pictured. Ideal throw pillow cover decoration for your sofa, bed and chair, etc. Fits 18x18 inches size pillow insert.

BEST GIFT:Perfect for youto decorate your room in a simple and natural way and add a little more life and fun in your room.It is the best gift for woman, men, friends, mom, dad, sister, brother, grandma, grandpa, wife, husband and all other beloved ones.
WASHING CARE: Machine washes in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry by low temperature, cool iron if needed.
INVISIBLE ZIPPER: Thethrow pillow cover with invisible zipper improves the appearance.
PLEASE NOTE：The pattern is only on the front side.PILLOW INSERT NOT INCLUDED.
description: Such agreatthrow pillow coverisperfectfor you to decorate your room in a simple and natural way.
